ValidationRule.description: The Parent field must be a valid Salesforce Id (This is not looked up in the System, only that the format matches a Salesforce Id).
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF( REGEX(project_cloud__Parent__c, '^[a-zA-Z0-9]+$'), /** must be alphanumeric **/ IF( LEN(project_cloud__Parent__c) == 18, CASESAFEID(LEFT(project_cloud__Parent__c, 15)) != project_cloud__Parent__c, /** if its 18 characters, verify that the 3 digit calculated suffix is valid **/ IF (LEN(project_cloud__Parent__c) == 15, /** any 15 digit alphanumeric is valid **/ false, true ) ) , true )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The value of the parent field must be an Id
